<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 73, 803, 107]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[117, 260, 875, 308]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[118, 322, 630, 339]]<|/det|>
